thread.title: Ureport: STATEHOUSE ADVISER JOSHUA KUTUNY COMES UP WITH A NEW CAMPAIGN SLOGAN - The Standard
thread.title_full: Ureport: STATEHOUSE ADVISER JOSHUA KUTUNY COMES UP WITH A NEW CAMPAIGN SLOGAN - The Standard

author: Gideon Kiprop
title: Ureport: STATEHOUSE ADVISER JOSHUA KUTUNY COMES UP WITH A NEW CAMPAIGN SLOGAN - The Standard
text: Share Joshua Kutuny After losing the 2013 general elections to Boston Marathon Champion Wesley Korir, President Uhuru Kenyattaâ€™s political adviser Joshua Kutuny has used his five years to re-invent his political career.Kutuny, who lost his seat for allegedly playing national politics more than concentrating on his parliamentary seat has re-surged politically and has this time picked a new slogan "Heshimu Raia" which loosely translates to respect the citizens.The Former lawmaker says the slogan is part of a lesson he has learned in politics, that of respecting the ordinary Wananchi who he says are the bosses in politics."In 2013 I played the national league until my own backyard was taken away from me but I was lucky President Kenyatta gave me a pie in his government. However this time round I will play the local in the local league," said Kutuny.Kutuny has in the recent past compared himself to an eagle which undergoes a rebirth to extend its lifespan by removing their beaks, talons, and feathers in order to grow new ones, saying he would make a strong political comeback in the August polls.He is expected to resign this month to focus on reclaiming his seat, will face off for the party primaries with Korir who has defected to Jubilee party.Kutuny is considered a front-runner in the parliamentary race which has attracted over ten aspirants.
